SinhalaMeanings:
රැඳී සිටිනවා,
නැවතී සිටිනවා,
(යමක්/කෙනෙක් වෙනුවෙන්) බලාගෙන ඉන්නවා

Usage:
~ (something) (up)
~ from something (to something)
~ to do something

~ something
~ (someone/something) to do something
~ someone/something doing something
~ someone/something + adj.

~ someone
~ (someone) about/against someone/something
~ (someone) of something
~ (someone) that

~ something
~ something on someone/something
~ something (in) doing something
~ someone/something as something

SinhalaMeanings:
නරඹනවා,
බලනවා,
ප්‍රවේසමෙන් සලකා බලනවා,
සෝදිසියෙන් සිටිනවා,
මුර කරනවා
Usage:
~ someone/something
~ (something) (for something)
~ wh-
~ someone/something doing something
~ someone/something do something
~ over someone/something

SinhalaMeanings:
අත වනනවා,
(කොඩි ආදිය) ලෙළ දෙනවා,
රැළි ගැහෙනවා/ගස්සනවා
Usage:
~ at/to someone
~ something at someone
~ someone something
~ something (to someone)
~ adv./prep.
~ someone/something + adv./prep.

SinhalaMeanings:
යම් බරක් වෙනවා,
බර කිරනවා,
සසඳා බලනවා

Usage:
~ something
~ at something
~ aginst someone/something
~ something from someone
~ someone something

~ something (on something)

~ (that)

~ someone/something + adv./prep.
~ to do something
~ someone something
~ someone/something to do something
~ for something
